bibl.title: Adespota Papyracea Hexametra Graeca (APHex I). Hexameters of Unknown or Uncertain Authorship from Graeco-Roman Egypt

series.title: Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts.

bibl.seg: 364 Anthologiae Astronomica et Astrologica Carmina varia Graeca Epica Hymni pagani Scholastica
Marco Perale, Adespota Papyracea Hexametra Graeca (APHex I). Hexameters of Unknown or Uncertain Authorship from Graeco-Roman Egypt = Sozomena. 18.
Berlin - Boston, de Gruyter, 2020, xxxii-494 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-11-029503-0. €119,95.

Publication plan. - Introduction. - Fragments of cosmogonic content and foundation poems [Nos 1-6]. - Didactic and technical poetry: astronomical and astrological [Nos 7-12]. - Didactic and technical poetry: other [Nos 13-16]. - Hymns [Nos 17-32]. - Erotic poetry: Hero and Leander [Nos 33-34]. - Erotic poetry: other [Nos 35-38]. - Epithalamia [Nos 39-43]. - Two hexameter anthologies [Nos 44-45]. - Bibliography. Indexes and concordances.
bibl.note: Publication plan. - Introduction. - Fragments of cosmogonic content and foundation poems [Nos 1-6]. - Didactic and technical poetry: astronomical and astrological [Nos 7-12]. - Didactic and technical poetry: other [Nos 13-16]. - Hymns [Nos 17-32]. - Erotic poetry: Hero and Leander [Nos 33-34]. - Erotic poetry: other [Nos 35-38]. - Epithalamia [Nos 39-43]. - Two hexameter anthologies [Nos 44-45]. - Bibliography. Indexes and concordances.
